```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data_23 = read.csv("Cleaned Data/modified_2023.csv")
```

```{r}
summary(data_23)
```
```{r}
# Count missing values in each column
missing_data <- data_23 %>% summarise_all(~sum(is.na(.)))
  
# View missing data summary
missing_data
```

```{r}
# Scatter plot of Rank vs. Score
ggplot(data_23, aes(x = Rank, y = Score)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Rank", y = "Score")
```
```{r}
data_23 %>%
  group_by(Apparatus) %>%
  summarise(
    Avg_D_Score = mean(D_Score, na.rm = TRUE),
    Avg_E_Score = mean(E_Score, na.rm = TRUE),
    Avg_Score = mean(Score, na.rm = TRUE),
    Max_Score = max(Score)
  ) %>% arrange(Max_Score)
```

```{r}
data_23 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Apparatus, y = Score)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Boxplots of Scores by Apparatus Category",
       x = "Apparatus Category",
       y = "Score") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

```


```{r}
# Example: Identify top 5 athletes with the highest scores
top_athletes <- data_23 %>%
  arrange(desc(Score))

# View the top athletes
top_athletes
  #%>%  filter(Country == "USA")
```
